title: annai pOl
sahitya:
annai pOl ennai nI AtkoNDu aruLa vA cennaik-kandak-kOTTa manram kuDi koNDavA


anupallavi

  unnaittAn enran urutuNai enru nAn enrumE urudiyAga eNNi varuginrEn


caraNam    kanrinukkup-pAl adanaik-kaLittUTTum pashu pOl unranadu uLLam enpAl uruga vENum
tunbamEdum ennai enrumE toDarAda inba sukham peravE ihaparam iraNDilum
